M

MachineIdProcessor - Class in org.beiter.michael.eaudit4j.processors.machineid
This processors allows to either configure a machine identifier through a configuration property, or to determine it from an environment variable, from the hostname, or fall back on a randomly generated ID.
MachineIdProcessor() - Constructor for class org.beiter.michael.eaudit4j.processors.machineid.MachineIdProcessor
 
MachineIdProperties - Class in org.beiter.michael.eaudit4j.processors.machineid
This class specifies properties specific to the Machine ID Processor.
MachineIdProperties() - Constructor for class org.beiter.michael.eaudit4j.processors.machineid.MachineIdProperties
Constructs an empty set of machine ID properties, with most values being set to null, 0, or empty (depending on the type of the property).
MachineIdProperties(MachineIdProperties) - Constructor for class org.beiter.michael.eaudit4j.processors.machineid.MachineIdProperties
Creates a set of machine ID properties from an existing set of machine ID properties, making a defensive copy.
MapBasedMachineIdPropsBuilder - Class in org.beiter.michael.eaudit4j.processors.machineid.propsbuilder
This class builds a set of MachineIdProperties using the settings obtained from a Map.

O

org.beiter.michael.eaudit4j.processors.machineid - package org.beiter.michael.eaudit4j.processors.machineid
Provides a processor that creates a unique machine ID for the machine executing the library and appends it as a field to audit events
org.beiter.michael.eaudit4j.processors.machineid.propsbuilder - package org.beiter.michael.eaudit4j.processors.machineid.propsbuilder
Provides classes to build the properties required for the machine ID processor module.

P

process(Event) - Method in class org.beiter.michael.eaudit4j.processors.machineid.MachineIdProcessor
This method processes an event in the default audit stream.
process(Event, String) - Method in class org.beiter.michael.eaudit4j.processors.machineid.MachineIdProcessor
This method processes an event in the provided audit stream.
process(Event, String, ProcessingObjects) - Method in class org.beiter.michael.eaudit4j.processors.machineid.MachineIdProcessor
This method processes an event in the provided audit stream and includes a set of ProcessingObjects.

R

revert(Event) - Method in class org.beiter.michael.eaudit4j.processors.machineid.MachineIdProcessor
This method removes the machine ID field from an event.

S

setAdditionalProperties(Map<String, String>) - Method in class org.beiter.michael.eaudit4j.processors.machineid.MachineIdProperties
Any additional properties which have not been parsed, and for which no getter/setter exists, but are to be stored in this object nevertheless.
setEventFieldName(String) - Method in class org.beiter.michael.eaudit4j.processors.machineid.MachineIdProperties
Set the field name to be used when storing the machine ID in audit events
setMachineId(String) - Method in class org.beiter.michael.eaudit4j.processors.machineid.MachineIdProperties
Set the machine ID of this machine.
setMachineIdEnvName(String) - Method in class org.beiter.michael.eaudit4j.processors.machineid.MachineIdProperties
Set the name of the environment variable from which the machine ID of this machine should be read
setMachineIdFromEnv(boolean) - Method in class org.beiter.michael.eaudit4j.processors.machineid.MachineIdProperties
The indication of whether the machine ID should be read from an environment variable.
setMachineIdFromHostname(boolean) - Method in class org.beiter.michael.eaudit4j.processors.machineid.MachineIdProperties
The indication of whether the machine ID should be created from the hostname

U

Util - Class in org.beiter.michael.eaudit4j.processors.machineid
A utility class providing methods to resolve the machine ID from: an environment variable or a hostname or as a random ID
